headline: Professional estate liquidation across Los Angeles
para1: ClearPath started with a simple observation: estate sales were inefficient, undervalued property, and made a stressful process worse.
para2: We built a better system. Professional appraisals. Strategic pricing. Efficient execution. Our app streamlines communication and maximizes returns.
para3: Five years, 165+ sales. We handle estates from Pasadena to Malibu with the same approach: expert valuation, organized presentation, professional results.
